name: Environment, Society and Economy in Ptolemaic and Roman Egypt
description: This course provides a review of the environmental, social and economic features of Egypt from 332 BC to 642 AD.  Same as (IEEC52H3), CLAC05H3 0.50 pre-1800 credit Ancient World Area
prerequisites: 2.0 credits in CLA or HIS courses, including 2 of the following [CLAA04H3/HISA07H3, CLAB05H3/HISB10H3, CLAB06H3/HISB11H3]
